attributes.description: MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.

attributes.title: 2021 GWM P-Series CV 2.0 TD SX Single-Cab

attributes.description:
For the facelifted CR-V, the focus has shifted more towards value for money as buyers are shopping for a soft-roader SUV that places a priority on practicality and school run duties, as opposed to any real off-roading.
The exterior changes to the grille in particular have given the CR-V a more stylish and modern look. Overall the new design has helped make the CR-V look less bulky and more athletic.
Other updates to the CR-V occur under the skin and include improvements to the ride and comfort levels, and a decrease in noise and vibrations within the cabin.
There's not much in the compact SUV category that can match the CR-V for space. It has a huge boot at 556-Litres and the rear seats can be folded flat to offer more loading space. Rear room is excellent.
Standard equipment on the CR-V is commendable and once you factor that into the price the CR-V becomes an even more attractive offering. Front and rear parking sensors and climate control are also standard as is the seven-inch touchscreen that controls audio and media functions. There's a cool economy measurement chart that compares current drive to previous drives and personal best consumption. The overall functionality is good and it does all its jobs well, plus there's an HDMI port.
The Honda CR-V ranks safety highly on its priority list and its standard safety equipment includes six airbags, ABS, EBD, traction and stability control as well as ISOFIX seat anchors in the rear.
It's quite difficult to pick rivals for the Honda CR-V 2.0 as it actually occupies a bit of niche within the segment. Most entry spec compact SUVs are going the small capacity turbocharged route and the higher end ones are automatic and diesel so the CR-V 2.0 sits somewhere in the middle. We see the buyer as someone who wants the confirmed reliability of a naturally-aspirated engine, but doesn't want to skimp on specification levels. 

Finance available and
Trade ins welcome.
